video_prompt: A golden energy vortex pulsates, drawing the viewer deeper as concentric light lines radiate and stream. A blinding central light flares, casting dynamic golden energy trails. Foreground bokeh lights float, streak, and shift in color (golden, purple, blue). Background circuit patterns glimmer while an abstract blue and purple sphere swirls and evolves. The entire composition intensely vibrates and shifts, conveying immense energy and technological flux.
image_prompt: **High-contrast, vibrant science fiction abstract.** A central, deep, glowing golden energy vortex, radiating concentric circles and lines, draws the viewer into an intensely bright, star-like white core. The background is a dark blue-black cosmic void, intricately patterned with glowing golden circuit-board lines and metallic textures. Streaking golden, purple, pink, and blue bokeh lights fill the dynamic foreground, with a blurry, swirling blue and purple abstract cosmic sphere in the upper left. Emphasize immense motion, technological complexity, and hyperspace travel.
refined_video_prompt: A golden energy vortex pulsates, drawing the view deeper as concentric light lines radiate and stream. A blinding central light flares, casting dynamic golden energy trails. Foreground bokeh lights float, streak, and seamlessly shift through golden, purple, and blue hues. Background circuit patterns subtly glimmer. An abstract blue and purple sphere swirls and continuously evolves. The entire composition intensely vibrates and shifts, conveying immense energy and technological flux.
